name: polyswarm
label: PolySwarm
description: PolySwarm is a real-time threat intelligence from a crowdsourced network of security experts and antivirus companies.

fields.name: api_key
fields.title: API Key
fields.tooltip: Specify the PolySwarm API Key through which you will connect and perform actions on PolySwarm.
fields.description: Specify the PolySwarm API Key through which you will connect and perform actions on PolySwarm.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Scan URL
operations.description: Uploads a URL to PolySwarm and retrieves the analysis results.

parameters.name: artifact
parameters.title: URL
parameters.description: Specify the URL for which you want to retrieve the reputation information.

operations.title: Scan IP
operations.description: Uploads a IP to PolySwarm and retrieves the analysis results.

parameters.name: artifact
parameters.title: IP
parameters.description: Specify the IP for which you want to retrieve the reputation information.

operations.title: Scan Domain
operations.description: Uploads a domain to PolySwarm and retrieves the analysis results.

parameters.name: artifact
parameters.title: Domain
parameters.description: Specify the domain for which you want to retrieve the reputation information.

operations.title: File Reputation
operations.description: Queries PolySwarm for file reputation information.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.title: Hash
parameters.tooltip: The value of the file hash for which to retrieve the reputation information. The hash type can be: "SHA256", "SHA1", or "MD5".
parameters.description: The value of the file hash for which to retrieve the reputation information. The hash type can be: "SHA256", "SHA1", or "MD5".

operations.title: File Scan
operations.description: Uploads a file to PolySwarm and retrieves the analysis results.

parameters.name: input
parameters.title: Type
parameters.description: Choose between Attachment ID or a File IRI.

parameters.name: value
parameters.title: Reference ID
parameters.description:
Reference ID that is used to access the attachment metadata from the FortiSOARâ„¢ Attachments module.
In the playbook, if you select 'Attachment ID', this defaults to the {{vars.attachment_id}} value or if you select 'File IRI', then this defaults to the {{vars.file_iri}} value.

operations.title: File Rescan
operations.description: Rescans the uploaded artifact by hash.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.title: Hash
parameters.tooltip: The type of the file hash to rescan. The hash type can be: "SHA256", "SHA1", or "MD5".
parameters.description: The type of the file hash to rescan. The hash type can be: "SHA256", "SHA1", or "MD5".
